document_data.name: Amandarn
document_data.mainbody: '''Amandarn''' was a [[rogue]] and adventurer in the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He considered himself sufficiently short, being slim, almost child-sized, and boyish. He was taller than a [[dwarf]], however.
document_data.Personality: As an adventurer, he saw himself as more of a "wealth redistributor" than a thief.
document_data.Possessions: He carried a ''[[glowblade]]'' and wore at least one black glove. His adventuring group later came to jointly own a castle.
document_data.Relationships: He was part of a group of adventurers together with [[Nuressa]], [[Iyriklaunavan]], and [[Folossan]].
